.. automodule:: cernservicexml

Installation
============

The CERN Service XML package is on PyPI so all you need is:

.. code-block:: console

    $ pip install cernservicexml

Usage
=====

.. automodule:: cernservicexml.document

.. automodule:: cernservicexml.publisher
